"Communa": "There's a whole buncha ways to communicate, and I can teach you all about them, darlin'."
"Yoohoo! Great timing, love. I've got a thing or two I wanted to talk with you about."
"Have you gotten the hang of communicating with your allies?"
"If you want, I could teach you a couple tricks to help get you started."
"The most important part of communication, I think, is also the most basic. You know, your hello's and thank-you's. Yeah."
"Can't hold a conversation without those, right?"
"Come on, don't be shy. Show me your best \"Howdy!\""
"Aw, alright. Come on back if the mood strikes ya. You know where to find me!"
"That sort of communication with your allies will go a long way, so make use of it!"
"There's a whole buncha ways to communicate, and I can teach you all about them, darlin'."
